attributes.action: A three day weekend for all (Friday, Saturday, Sunday)
attributes.additional_details: I signed a petition about children having a 3 day weekend including Friday, but parents and others are working on Fridays so there may be nobody to look after them. Where as if all had a three day weekend parents would be able to look after children with no worry or struggle.
attributes.background: I would like the Government or Parliament to make it law that all people should be able to have a 3 day weekend (Friday, Saturday, Sunday).

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. Decisions about the days people work are a matter for individuals and their employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We could accept a petition calling for a minimum 3 days off per working week, but it would still be a decision for employers and employees how that was managed.
